meaningMnemonic: A small <radical>tsunami</radical> comes in the <radical>morning</radical> with the <radical>moon</radical>. That just means the ocean gets bigger when the moon's out, and that my friends is simply the <kanji>tide</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You go check out the <kanji>tide</kanji>. The water is coming in a little stronger, and something washes up on the shore. It's a body! You roll the body over and it is Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう)!
